title: Market Volatility, Jobs Report, 2020
itunes:title: Market Volatility, Jobs Report, 2020
description:
Kevin talked to Gina Martin Adams, Chief Equity Strategist for Bloomberg intelligence about Coronavirus fears and impact to the markets.


Panel guests: Mattie Dupler, Senior Fellow at the National Taxpayers Union and former Former Coalitions Director for the House Republican Conference and Suzanne Lynch, Washington Correspondent for the Irish Times.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
